import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Col, Row, Label, Form, FormGroup, Input, ButtonDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem } from 'reactstrap'; const MyForm = (props) => { const [dropdownOpen, setOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setOpen(!dropdownOpen); return (
Please choose your options!

); } export default MyForm;
